Name: rectum rhabdomyosarcoma
Definition: A rectum sarcoma that is located_in the rectum in which the cancer cells are thought to arise from skeletal muscle progenitors.

Name: rectum leiomyosarcoma
Definition: A rectum sarcoma that is a smooth muscle tumor and is located_in the rectum.

Name: rectum Kaposi's sarcoma
Definition: A sarcoma of the rectum that results_in lesions that are located_in the rectum.
